dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Blatant Copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 28, 2005 4:55 PM
To: sysop@emcs.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Blatant Copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Blatant Copyright infringement
Date: Thu, 28 Apr 2005 11:37:18 -0400
From: Howard Frisvold <sysop@emcs.net>
To: abuse@theplanet.com,  copyright@theplanet.com,
legal@theplanet.com,         cheryl@carnrightdesign.com,
promote@cybrconsult.com, jyu1108@hotmail.com

To whom it may concern,

This email is to inform THEPLANET.COM that they are currently hosting a
website that is in violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act .

The Website design is owned and Copyrighted by Carnright Design and has been
in service in its current form since July 2004. Carnright Design has had all
of the carnrightdesign.com websites copyrighted since 1999.
The current Website was Copyrighted through Cybrconsult.com since July of
2004.  The website is available online at http://www.carnrightdesign.com.

The unapproved (hijacked)copy has been modified only in the fact that traces
of the name and logo for Carnright Design were replaced with the information
of the company responsible for the infringement. This Website wyhspace.com
has only been registered to this company since November 29, 2004.

If you look at the WEB Portfolio link of both sites you will see that they
both refer to the same sites as their Web Portfolio. If you go through the
list in the Web Portfolio and click on the sites you will see that
Carnrightdesign.com listed is listed as the designer and copyright owner of
many of the sites. Also listed in the site are Team members, EMCS.NET being
one of them. I can personally tell you, as President of EMCS.NET, that we
are in no way associated with wyhspace.com.

We are asking that the owners of this site be informed and that the website
in its current form be removed from the Internet.

Thank you for your attention to this matter,

Howard Frisvold
Endless Mountain CyberSPACE, Inc.



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCcVupvK/XpJs6oyURAqkpAJ0RtPqvRBR/vl+7LptOt5xklGOZxQCgotyt
H5VrLXaD5GRbfg/sOsi3QNw=
=znwn
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
